byline.original: By CEYLAN YEGINSU and VICTOR HOMOLA
byline.contributor: Ceylan Yeginsu reported from Istanbul, and Victor Homola from Berlin. Andrea Zarate contributed reporting from Lima, Peru.

lead_paragraph: The suicide bomber, who died in the attack on Tuesday, was identified as an Islamic State operative who entered Turkey from Syria on Jan. 5.

headline.print_headline: Istanbul Bomber Entered as a Refugee, Turks Say
headline.main: Istanbul Bomber Entered as a Refugee, Turks Say

snippet: The suicide bomber, who died in the attack on Tuesday, was identified as an Islamic State operative who entered Turkey from Syria on Jan. 5.
abstract: Turkish officials say suicide bomber who attacked Istanbul's central tourist district entered country from Syria and was registered as refugee; bomber is identified as Nabil Fadil.
